entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Richibucto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 6:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thundershower late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
